title: CoreWeave Stock Slides As AI Concerns Rise: What's Happening?
description: CoreWeave, Inc. (NASDAQ:CRWV) is trading lower Wednesday, falling alongside artificial intelligence stocks following reports suggesting that Blue Owl Capital will not provide funding for a $10 billion Oracle data center.
content:

title: AI can detect early signs of aging from chest X-rays
description: Artificial intelligence may be able to reveal how fast your body is aging by analyzing a chest X-ray, according to a new study published in The Journals of Gerontology, Series A: Biological Sciences and Medical Sciences. Researchers found that a deep learning model was able to detect subtle, age-related changes in the heart, lungs, and overall health more effectively than leading DNA-based "epigenetic clocks."
content: Artificial intelligence may be able to reveal how fast your body is aging by analyzing a chest X-ray, according to a new study published in The Journals of Gerontology, Series A: Biological Sciences and Medical Sciences. Researchers found that a deep... [1740 chars]

title: AI interference in everyday life is challenging human sovereignty, sensibilities: Tomar
description: Bhopal, Dec 17 (PTI) Madhya Pradesh Assembly Speaker Narendra Singh Tomar said on Wednesday that challenges of managing humanitarian-focused development in the 21st century are becoming increasingly difficult in the current technology-driven age. He said interference of artificial intelligence (AI) in everyday life is challenging human sovereignty and sensibilities, and that robot culture is creating […]

title: Amazon taps veteran Peter DeSantis to lead AI, chip and quantum push
description: Amazon on Wednesday tapped long-time cloud executive Peter DeSantis to lead a new unit that would oversee its most advanced technologies, including artificial intelligence models, custom silicon and quantum computing.
content:
DeSantis, who has been with the company for nearly three decades, has led Amazon Web Services infrastructure and utility computing businesses, overseeing global data centers and core cloud services.

title: Tech stocks plunge as AI angst returns

content:

title: AI Toys Put Kids at Risk, Senators Warn
description: Sens. Marsha Blackburn, R-Tenn., and Richard Blumenthal, D-Conn., are demanding information from prominent toy manufacturers about the use of artificial intelligence.
content:
Sens. Marsha Blackburn, R-Tenn., and Richard Blumenthal, D-Conn., are demanding information from prominent toy manufacturers about the use of artificial intelligence.

title: Amazon says AI chief Rohit Prasad is leaving, Peter DeSantis to lead 'AGI' group
description: Rohit Prasad, a top Amazon executive overseeing its artificial general intelligence unit, will leave the company at the end of this year, the company confirmed.
content:

title: WHO seeks evidence for traditional medicine
description: The World Health Organization opens a major conference on traditional medicine on Wednesday, arguing that new technologies, including artificial intelligence, can bring scientific scrutiny to centuries-old healing practices.
